subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Nicolas Anelka’s two goals kept Chelsea at the top of the English Premier League with a 2-0 victory at Blackburn. Anelka became the league’s leading scorer with 10 goals as Chelsea earned its ninth straight road league victory. Chelsea and Liverpool each have 29 points, but the Blues are ahead on goal difference.
